title: model: scikit: Scikit models not verifying length of feature passed
body:
Related: #699 

## Steps To Reproduce

```console
dffml train \
    -model scikitknn \                                                                         
    -model-predict label:int:1 \
    -model-features image:int:1 \
    -sources images=idx3 label=idx1 \
    -source-images-filename train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz \
    -source-images-feature image \
    -source-label-filename train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz \
    -source-label-feature label \
    -log debug
```
works without throwing any errors.

Tensorflow DNN classifier model throws the following error: 
```console
dffml train \                                                                                      
    -model tfdnnc \                                                                            
    -model-batchsize 1000 \     
    -model-hidden 30 50 25 \           
    -model-clstype int \             
    -model-predict label:int:1 \
    -model-classifications $(seq 0 9) \
    -model-features image:int:1 \               
    -sources images=idx3 label=idx1 \
    -source-images-filename train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz \
    -source-images-feature image \
    -source-label-filename train-labels-idx1-ubyte.gz \
    -source-label-feature label \
    -log debug
```

```console
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: tensor_name = dnn/hiddenlayer_0/kernel; shape in shape_and_slice spec [1,30] does not match the shape stored in checkpoint: [1568,30]
	 [[node save/RestoreV2_1 (defined at /anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow_estimator/python/estimator/estimator.py:1493) ]]
```
